name: Last Chance Robbery
description:
THIS GAME WAS MADE FOR TRIJAM 155 IN THREE HOURS

Last Chance Robbery is a game about robbery. Who could have guessed. You have a minute to rob a bank before the police come and get you. Get as much loot as you can before the timer runs out, don't be greedy or you will get caught!

CONTROLS

WASD to move

Click on items to pick them up

CREDITS

benboy - Coder/Artist

BigOwen#0388 - Musician and Emotional Support
